name: NEON GENDER EVANGELION
description:
Made for Trans Gal Jam 3 by @nadianova (https://nadianova.itch.io/)

A game loosely about trans rage and the Trans Agenda™. Rip and tear......

Credits:

Programming, UI, cover and title art, game design by @XELOS_ (https://twitter.com/XELOS_)

Music/sound, level art&design, writing, game concept, design and balancing by @axoletlmusic
(https://twitter.com/axoletlmusic)

Still in vague development! Minor hiccups and balances to be ironed out!
